hero.title: Ecommerce
hero.subtitle: We leave everything ready so that your business has the ability to sell 24/7.
content: Having an online store is an essential requirement for any company that sells products in 2022.
It doesn't matter if you're in retail or wholesale, your customers want to see what your business has to offer.
At Smooth Design we take care of the technical and design aspects to help you get your online store selling as quickly as possible.

services_list.title: Visual design of your store
services_list.description: We take care of the design aspects so that your store has an attractive and professional look

services_list.title: Development
services_list.description: We take care of the development of your store, using the technology that best suits your particular case

services_list.title: Configuration and maintenance
services_list.description: Custom domain, hosting, SSL certificate, all included free for one year

services_list.title: control panel
services_list.description: Through a control panel you can carry out a correct control of the inventory of your store

services_list.title: Marketplaces Integration
services_list.description: Integrate your online store with marketplaces so you can sell your products on third-party platforms

services_list.title: Synchronization with social networks
services_list.description: We synchronize the products of your store with social networks such as instagram and facebook

mobile_content.title: Mobile Design
mobile_content.subtitle: In all our designs we place special emphasis on design for tablets and smartphones.
mobile_content.title_two: More than 60% of online purchases are made from smartphones
mobile_content.subtitle_two: Hence the importance of mobile design in any ecommerce project.

content: We work with the most popular platforms in the industry and also do custom development if required.
We always do our best and advise our clients on what their best options are according to their particular case.
If what you want is to take the next step in your ecommerce project, we invite you to tell us more about your project.
